snippet.title: Game & Watch - Manhole (Gold) (c)1981 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This the Game & Watch Manhole (Gold series) handheld game, an early Game & Watch unit from Nintendo, released in 1981.

Manhole would be reissued as part of the "New Wide Screen" series in 1983, but this earlier version has some significant gameplay differences, such as the state of play continuing from where it left off shortly after you lose a life, which makes it easy to lose a number of lives in quick succession if you don't stay on your toes.  This version also has less elaborate animations for losing a life.  I covered some of this in a 'Spotlight MAME' episode.

Recent work on Game & Watch emulation has come from Algestam, with earlier work being done by Sean Riddle and hap.  DarthMarino provided the artwork for more recently emulated units, while hydef was generally responsible for the artwork on ones emulated before 2020, links to the artwork are below

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
